attributes.action: Remove MP's who Refuse to Accept the Democratic Right of the Leave vote & Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Additionally We Request the UK Government Puts in Place any Required Policy to Prevent Any EU Policy that comes in and has a Negative impact Before the Completion of the Brexit Talks.
attributes.background: This Petition is to Protect the Rights of the UK People All 17M+ Who have Voted for the Brexit and to Remove Any MP's who are intent Preventing the UK Exiting the EU and the Criminal Policies Set out to Impact Negative Agenda on UK. Article 50 needs to be Activated to Protect the Democratic Vote.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

If you want the UK Government and Parliament to invoke Article 50 immediately, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133618
